attributes.action: Listen to actually consider the Petitions on http://petitions.pm.gov.uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Like many others, I was under the impression the understanding of these e-petitions, was so the govt. would actually listen to peoples views, and sometimes the majority.

Every petition I, and many others have signed, the response has been the govt. has considered the views and is not going to change anything.

It would be unrealistic to expect action on every petition, but I have yet to see one, yes ONE petition where the response has been one to admit something is going to change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
